descriptionHtml:
-- WANT THIS BANNER FOR YOUR FACTION/HOUSE/QUEST MOD? FEEL FREE TO REQUEST A VERSION WITH YOUR FLAG/EMBLEM/LOGO/COAT OF ARMS OF CHOICE --

Flag banner by GreyFox77
Modders resource

22-11-2012 v1.0 Initial release
22-11-2012 v1.1 Flag of Sweden included as another example
16-12-2012 Added optional file: 2 Knights of the Nine banners per request by MadMat88

Description
=================================
This resource can be used freely, but please list me in your credits if you release any mod containing this mesh.

This mesh is based on a kind of flag/banner often used in the Netherlands.
Here it is called a \"wimpel\", and every province has it\'s own. The example textures in this archive are those of the provinces Gelderland, Friesland (albeit slightly different) and Groningen. v1.1: Sweden included too as another example.

PSD and MAX files in source folder should provide the tools necessary to customize the mesh/texture to your liking.


Install
=================================
To put it ingame you will have to 1) fix texture paths in NIF with NifSkope, 2) add as a static object in the CK.


Stats
=================================
Mesh stats:
Poly\'s		216
Verts			127
No collision model. Can be added upon request.

Textures:
wimpel.dds	(banner)
Diffuse 		256x1024 dxt1 no alpha (4 MIP maps)
Normal+Specular	128x512 dxt5 (4 MIP maps)

parts.dds	(nail, wire, etc)
Diffuse		256x512 dxt1 no alpha (4 MIP maps)
Normal+Specular	256x512 dxt5 (4 MIP maps)


Credits
=================================
Thanks to Bethesda and Nexusmods.


Legal
=================================
Please credit me if you distribute this mesh as part of a mod.

Cheers.
author: GreyFox77
